CustomField.formula: CASE( MONTH( Opportunity__r.CloseDate), 1, (12 * WR_Outbound__c), 2,(11 * WR_Outbound__c), 3,(10 * WR_Outbound__c), 4,(9 * WR_Outbound__c), 5,(8 * WR_Outbound__c), 6,(7 * WR_Outbound__c), 7,(6 * WR_Outbound__c), 8,(5 * WR_Outbound__c), 9,(4 * WR_Outbound__c), 10,(3 * WR_Outbound__c), 11,(2 * WR_Outbound__c), WR_Outbound__c )
CustomField.label: Total Revenue Outbound
